name: Fremont Patroller
collaborators: Erick Mock, Marc Fieser, Pavel Parkhomey
description: Utilized Seattle's Open Data Program API (via Socrata) to let users choose a date range to see graphs of bike traffic across the Fremont Bridge displayed.

name: Fitomatic
description: Full stack application which allows logged in users to enter specific measurements in order to receive any number of bike models whose dimensions align with theirs.

name: reganoneill.io
description: Personal site I built to learn more about React and some popular libraries supporing it.
